閇字的基本解释

閇
bì
古同“闭”。

閇字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bì］
［《廣韻》博計切，去霽，幫。］
［《廣韻》方結切，入屑，非。］
“闭1”的繁体字。亦作“閇1”。亦作“1”。
(1)关闭门户等。
(2)指关闭门户之事。
(3)插门闩的孔。
(4)闭合。
(5)指憋、抑制或堵住不让出来。
(6)关押；幽禁。
(7)指把鸟兽等关起来。
(8)禁止。
(9)阻隔；壅塞。
(10)遮蔽。
(11)隐覆；埋没。
(12)防守。
(13)结束，停止。
(14)收藏；隐藏；埋藏。
(15)古指立秋、立冬。
(16)农历十二月月建的别称。
(17)指解不开的结。
(18)通“”、“柲”。弓檠。
(19)通“比”。
(20)姓。

閇字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【門字部】　閇； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页1330第12
【玉篇】俗閉字。

閇字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
閇字的起名意思

暂无。

閇
Basic explanation of words
閇
bì
Gu Tong "closed".
閇
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bì］
["Guang Yun" Bo Ji cut, go to Ji, help. ]
["Guangyun" square knot cut, into the scraps, non. ]
"Close 1" in traditional characters. Also known as "閇1". Also known as "1".
(1) Close the portal, etc.
(2) Refers to closing the door.
(3) Insert the hole of the door latch.
(4) Closed.
(5) Refers to holding, restraining, or blocking to not let out.
(6) Detention; Confinement.
(7) It means to lock up birds and beasts.
(8) Prohibited.
(9) Obstruction; congestion.
(10) Shading.
(11) Hidden; buried.
(12) Defense.
(13) End, stop.
(14) Collection; hide; bury.
(15) Ancient refers to the beginning of autumn and the beginning of winter.
(16) Another name for the monthly construction of December in the lunar calendar.
(17) Refers to knots that cannot be untied.
(18) Through "", "柲". Bow bark.
(19) Through "ratio".
(20) Last name.
閇
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集上】【Menzi Department】　閇; Kangxi strokes: 11; Page number: page 1330-12
[Jade articles] Vulgar closed characters.
閇
